QuestData.Title: Elemental Attunement
QuestData.Description: Even now, as we speak, the voice of Kalandrios continues to whisper to my mind.$b$b"The Hero of Azeroth must attune to the elements of the plateau."$b$bUpon the Elemental Plateau are four great pillars carved of living rock. Lay your hands upon the stone pillars and your soul will be attuned with the elements.$b$bI will continue to commune with the great furies and attempt to further understand their will while you journey to the plateau.
QuestData.LogDescription: Attune to the four elemental pillars.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you attuned with the elemental pillars upon the Elemental Plateau?
QuestData.RewardText: I see a fire within your eyes and a wind upon your step, $n.$b$bIf what Kalandrios speaks is true, you have attuned your life energy with each of the elemental forces on Draenor.$b$bThe voice says that you are now ready to undertake the Ritual of Binding.$b$bReturn to me when your work upon the plateau is finished and we will speak further.
